Atnan issekniyen n Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ahat tqelqev iman ik, imi ur ppilin d lmumnin
Ma ihwa ya£, ad asen d Nessers assekni seg igenni, ad îinzent, zdat es, tmegôav nnsen, s wannuz
Ur ten id ippas usmekti amaynut, s$uô Uênin, mebla ma u$alen as d inekkaôen
Ni$ skaddben. Ihi, ad asen d asen isallen, $ef wayen i$ef pmmaâliken
Day ur walan ara tamurt? Acêal i Nessenker degs n yal tayuga tukyist
Deg wayagi, s tidep, assekni. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipêunu
Mi Issawel Mass ik, i Musa: "ôuê s agdud imednas
agdud n Ferâun. Day ur ppezziben ara

ad sekkwôen idmaren iw, ur ipserriê yiles iw. Ihi, Azen ar Haôun
U denbe$ $uôsen. Ugade$ ad iyi n$en
Inna: "Xaîi, ôuêet s issekniyen nne£. Aql a£ yidwen, Nessemêas en. Ôö

Inna: "day ur k nôebba ara $uône$, d llufan? U tesâaddav $uône$, iseggwasen di lâameô ik
u txedmev igi txedmev. Keçç, seg ijehliyen
Inna: "xedme$ t asmi lli$ seg im$eôôqen

Inna i wi s d izzin: "la tsellem
Inna: "Mass nnwen, u Mass n lejdud nnwen, imezwura

ib$a a kwen issuffe$, s ssêur is, seg wakal nnwen. D acu t lameô nnwen

ad ak d awin yal aseêêar amusnaw

Inna: "ih, d$a, kunwi, war ccekk, a ppu$alem seg iqôiben

Iveggeô Musa taâkwazt is. Apan tesseblaâ ayen id snulfan
Iseêêaren $lin, knan

Mass n Musa akked Haôun
Inna: "tumnem yiS, uqbel ma serrêe$ awen? Neppa, war ccekk, d ameqwôan nnwen i wen issêefven ssêur. A ppeéôem, ad awen gezme$ afus sya, avaô sya; a kwen ûûemôe$ akw $ef umidag
Nnan: "ulac u$ilif, acku ar Mass nne$, ara nezzi

Kkes ed wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, id ismektayen aîas Öebbi, i irebêen mbaâd ma pwadensen. Ad éôen, wid idensen, tama anida ara ppin
Ïs. Atnan issekniyen n Leqwôan, akked Tezmamt ipbegginen
D nnhaya u d abecceô i lmumnin
wid ibedden i téallit, ippaken zzakat, ipputebbten $ef laxeôt nnsen
Ih, wid ur numin ara s laxeôt, Ncebbeê asen igiten nnsen, d$a ddebdeben
Widak, fellasen aâaqeb ucmit mavi. Di laxeôt, d nitni ara ixesôen ugwar
S tidep, keçç iusa k id Leqwôan, s$uô Bab n ûûwab, Amusnaw
Mi inna Musa i twacult is: "nek wala$ times, ad awen d awi$, segs, asali, ne$ ad awen d awi$ asafu iôeqqen, amar a ppesseêmum
Mi ibbwev $uôes, ipwanced: "ad iôqu wayen illan di tmes, akked wayen i as d izzin. Gedha s Öebbi, Mass imavalen
A Musa! Ih, Nek d Öebbi, Uzmir, Bab n ûûwab
Veggeô taâkwazt ik"! Mi p iwala la tesseêôiîiw, amzun d azrem, ibren, ur iwexxeô. "A Musa! Ur ppagwad! Ar $uôI, ih, ur ppagwaden imazanen
siwa win idensen, sinna, iu$al iwqem, deffir tuccva. Nek, s tidep, Psemmiêe$, Pêunnu
Ger afus ik di loib ik, a d iffe$ d amellal, ur ihlik. Si tza issekniyen, i Ferâun akked ugdud is. Nitni, war ccekk, d agdud icemten
Mi ten id usan issekniyen nne£, âinani, nnan: "wagi iban d ssêur
Ugin ten s ddens d pnefxa, u, deg iman nnsen, pputebbten. Wali, ihi, amek tevôa d ifessaden
Ni$ Nefka tamusni i Dawed akked Sliman. Nnan: "ccekôan i Öebbi, i a$ Ismenyafen i waîaû n yimdanen iumnen
Sliman iwôet Dawed, u inna: "a yimdanen! Nepwaselmed tutlayt n yifôax; ippunefk a$ si yal cci. Ayagi, s tidep, ard lfevl n ûûeê
Pwajemmlen d, i Sliman, i²âsekôiwen is si leonun, imdanen, ifôax. Mdarraren
Armi, mi bbwven ar te$zut n twevfin, tenna d tweîuft: "a yaweîîuf, kecmemt ar ixxamen nnkwent, mulac, war ccekk, a kwent iéd Sliman, neppa akked iâsekôiwen is, ur faqen
Icmumeê, ivûa, $ef wayen d tenna. Inna: "a Mass iw! Err iyi ad snemmre$ l$it iK, is i $ T$atev, nek akked imawlan iw; ad xedme$ ise$ ara Tôaviv; Ssekcem iyi, s uêunu K, ar imdanen iK imaânen
Issefqed ifôax, inna: "acimi ur wala$ ara iççibib, day d l$ayeb
War ccekk, ad sâaddi$ fellas aâaqeb uqsiê, ne$ a t zlu$, ne$ a d iawi tasebbiwt tubrizt
Ur iâaîîel ara. Inna d: "fehme$ ayen ur tefhimev. Usi$ d $uôek si Saba, s usali unûiê
Ih, ufi$ en tameîîut d tagelliî nnsen. Ippunefk as si yal cci. £uôes asgeld abarar
Ufi$ p in, neppat akked ugdud is, la kennun i yiîij, war Öebbi. Cciîan icebbeê asen igiten nnsen. Iveôf iten seg ubrid, d$a nitni ur pwanhan
Acimi ur knan ara i Öebbi, id Issufu$en lesrar, di tmurt akked igenwan, i Iéôan ayen teppeffrem u ayen d tepberriêem
Öebbi, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa, Mass n usgeld ameqwôaêan
Inna: "a néeô ma tessawlev d tidep, ne$ ma keçç seg ikeddaben
Öuê s tebôap iw agi, veggeô asen p, sinna, wexxeô asen, wali acu ara d rren
Tenna: "a yimvebbôen, tepwaveggeô iyi d tebôap tukyist
Ih, s$uô Sliman. Apan: s yisem n Öebbi Aênin Ipêunun
Ur ssem$waôet ara iman nnwen $uôi, aset ed $uôi, d imvuâen
Tenna: "a yimvebbôen, fket ed ôôay nnwen af lameô iw. Ur pseyyi$ lameô, siwa garawen
Nnan: "nekwni d imawlan n tezmert, nesâa lemêella tuqsiêt. Lameô i kem. Muqel d acu ara d tseyyiv
Tenna: "s tidep, igeldan ssefsaden tamdint ara kecmen. Sdullun imdanen is lâali. Akka ay xeddmen
Nek, ad asen azne$ tarzeft, ad aôou$ acu ara d awin imcegâan
Mi tebbwev ar Sliman, inna: "day ad iyi tâawnem s terkunt? Ayen i yi Ifka Öebbi, yif ayen i wen Ifka. D kunwi kan i ifeôêen, s terzeft nnwen
U$al $uôsen. Ih, a nôuê $uôsen s lâaskeô, iwumi ur zmiren. A ten id nessuffe$, syenna, ndellen, d imejîuêen
Inna: "a yimvebbôen, anwa degwen, ara yi d iawin asgeld is, uqbel a yi d asen d imvuâen
Aâfrit si leonun, inna d: "ad ak t id awi$, uqbel ma tekkrev seg umekkan ik. I wayagi, war ccekk, nek d uzmir muman

Inna d bab n tmusni si Tezmamt: "nek ad ak t id awi$, uqbel a pfukkev asmeômec". Mi t iwala irs ed $uôes, inna: "wagi si lfevl n Mass iw, ad iyi ijeôôeb ma ad snemmre$, ne$ ma ad jehle$. Win isnemmren, isnemmer kan i iman is. Win ijehl, ihi, Mass iw d Asâay, d Ukyis
Inna: "bedlet as udem usgeld is, a néeô ma tepwanha, ne$ haap seg wid ur nepwanha
Mi d tusa, nnan as: "day am wagi, usgeld inem"? Terra d: "amzun d neppa". "Tusa ya$ d tmusni, uqbel neppat, nuzen
Isôuê ip wayen tunez, war Öebbi. Tella, s tidep, seg ugdud ijehliyen

Nnan as: "ekcem ar lbeôo"! Mi t twala, t$il degs aman; tesban ed ifadden is. Inna: "s tidep, d lbeôo ulelluc imzin". Tenna: "a Mass iw! Ih, dense$ iman iw. Akked Sliman, unze$ aS i Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Ni$ Nuzen ed, i Tamud, gmat sen Üaliê: "âabdet Öebbi"! Maca, rran snat n trebbuya$, ppemnamarent
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acimi tep$awalem ar tucmip, uqbel ise$? Lemmer a ppeste$fôem Öebbi, ahat aêunu fellawen
Nnan: "tkeêêesev a$, keçç akked wi iddan yidek". Inna: "lfal nnwen ar Öebbi, u kunwi d agdud ara ippuhewwlen
Llan, di temdint, tza iterrasen i issefsaden di tmurt, ur pleqqimen
Nnan: "yyaw a nemmesgal s Öebbi, ard a neévem deg iv fellas, neppa akked twacult is. Sinna, a nini i bab is: ur nelli d inagan n tmen$iwt n tawacult is. Ih, nekwni, d imawlan n tidep
Undin ticeôkep, Nundi ticeôkep, nitni ur faqen
Wali amek tevôa di tceôkep nnsen. Nen$ed iten, nitni, akked ugdud nnsen, meôôa
Atnan hudden ixxamen nnsen, ilmend n ddens nnsen. Deg wayagi, war ccekk, assekni i ugdud issnen
Nsellek wid iumnen u llan pêezziben
I Luî, mi inna i ugdud is: "teppeddum ar wayen n dir, u kunwi tepwalim
Ih, kunwi teppeddum ar irgazen, teb$am ten, war tilawin. Ih, kunwi d agdud ur nessin
Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi d nnan: "ssuff$et tawacult n Luî, si temdint nnwen, nitni d imdanen i ib$an tezdeg
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameîîut is. Nseyya a ppili seg wid igwran
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur. I icmet ugeffur n wid ippunedôen
Ini: "ccekôan i Öebbi. Talwit i imdanen iS, wid Ifren". Ppif Öebbi, ne$ ayen pcaraken

Day Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, i wen d Isse$lin aman, seg igenni - Nessenkar, yissen, iqwiôen ippembehwaoen, ur teêwaoem a d tessem$im ttjuô is -, day illa ôebbi, ar tama n Öebbi? Maca, nitni d agdud issaâdalen
Day Win Irran tamurt d tanezdu$t, Irra degs isaffen, Irra yas idurar, Irra agadir ger sin ilellen, day illa ôebbi ar tama n Öebbi? Xaîi, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
Day Win Issemêasen i umevôuô, mara S d isiwel; Itekksen ayen n dir; i kwen Ipparan d igensas di tmurt; day illa ôebbi, ar tama n Öebbi? Drus id tesmektayem
Day Win i kwen Inehhun, di tillas n lberr akked yill, id Ippaznen avu, d abecceô n ccira uêunu S; day illa ôebbi, ar tama n Öebbi? Ay Aâlay Öebbi, sennig wayen pcaraken
Day Win Ibeddun lxelq, sinna, Ippales as; ikwen I$aten seg igenni akked tmurt; day illa ôebbi ar tama n Öebbi? Ini: "awit ed atebbet nnwen, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "tabavnit, di tmurt akked igenwan, ur p issin yiwen siwa Öebbi. Ur éôin melmi ara d kkren
Ih, tamusni nnsen ur tessawev ar laxeôt? Xaîi, nitni di ccekk fellas. Xaîi, nitni, fellas, dre$len
Nnan wid ijehlen: "day ma nu$al d akal, am imezwura nne$, s tidep, fella$ tanekra
Ni$ waââden a$ aya, i nekwni akw i imezwura nne$, zik. Ayagi, d timucuha kan imenza
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, walit amek tevôa d ibe$wviyen
Ur $webben fellasen, ur pxiqqi ilmend n nncub nnsen
Nnan: "melmi lemâahda agi, ma d tidep ay tessawalem
Ini: "kra n wayen i$ef têarem, ahat atan ivfeô kwen id
Mass ik, s tidep, meqqweô lfevl iS, $ef imdanen. Maca, tegwti degsen ur snemmiren

Ur illi wayen iffren, deg igenni akked tmurt, ur nuri di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ih, Leqwôan agi iêekku d i At Isôail, tegwti n wayen i$ef mgarraden
Neppa, war ccekk, ard nnhaya akked uêunu i lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, ad Iseyyi garasen s uêuddu S. Neppa d Uzmir, d Amusnaw
Ppkel $ef Öebbi, ih, aql ak di tidep ipbegginen
Ih, keçç, ur tepparav lmeggtin ad slen, ur tepparav iâeééugen ad slen i wancad, ma wexxôen
Ur fellak nnhaya ider$alen, mgal ttelfan nnsen. Ara islen, siwa wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£. Nitni d imvuâen
Mi iûaô wawal fellasen, ad asen d Nessuffe$ lweêc si tmurt; ad asen yini ar imdanen ur metbutit $ef issekniyen nne£
Ass ideg ara d Nefser, si yal lois, arbaâ n wid inekôen issekniyen nne£, d tirni
alamma, mi d usan, ad Yini: "day tnekôem issekniyen iW, ur ten teskecmem di tmusni? Ne$ d acu tellam txeddmem
Iûaô wawal fellasen, imi densen. Ur d pmeslayen
Day ur walan ara ar Nerra yasen iv i ureyyeê nnsen, ass iwakken ad walin? Deg wayagi, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Ass uûuvu n lbuq, ad iagwad i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, siwa wid i S ihwan i Öebbi. A d asen akw $uôeS, s uêiwet
A pwaliv idurar i t$ilev sebken, la teddun am usigna. D igi n Öebbi i Iûegmen yal cci. Neppa, s tidep, Iéôa d acu txedmem
Win id iusan s ise$, ad iawi it yifen. Widak, assen, mevmunit si tugdi
Wid id iusan s tucmip, ad ppin wudmawen nnsen ar tmes. Ni$ a ppeppuqeîîim kan $ef wayen txeddmem
Pwamôe$ kan ad âabde$ Mass n temdint agi, i Iôqa. IneS yal cci. Pwamôe$ d ad ili$ seg imduâen
ad male$ Leqwôan. Win ipwanhan, ipwanha kan i iman is. Win innetlafen, ini: "nek d aneddaô kan
Ini: "a neckeô Öebbi. Ad awen Issken issekniyen iS. A ten tâaqlem". Mass ik ur I$effel ara $ef wayen txeddmem

Atnan issekniyen n Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad ak d Neêku si teqûiî n Musa akked Ferâun, s tidep, i ugdud iumnen
Ih, Ferâun issem$weô iman is di tmurt; imezda$ ifeôq iten d iêôumen. Isrewrew îayfa segsen, izellu arrac nnsen, issidir tilawin nnsen. Ih, neppa seg ifessaden
Neb$a a Nfeôôeo $ef wid irewrwen di tmurt, a ten Nerr d imeqwôanen, a ten Nerr d iweôôaten
A ten Nesseqâad di tmurt. A Nessken i Ferâun, Haman, akked iâsekôiwen nnsen, ayen ppagwaden segsen
Nweêêa i imma s n Musa: "ssuîîev it, sinna, ma tugadev fellas, err it ar wasif. Ur ppagwad, ur $webben. Ad am t id Nerr, u a t Nerr seg imazanen
Teddem it twacult n Ferâun. Ad asen iu$al d acengu, d a$ilif. Ih, Ferâun, Haman, akked iâsekôiwen nnsen llan d imsaben
Tenna tmeîîut n Ferâun: "d nnûib n tiî, i nek akked keçç. Ur tneqq, ahat ad a$ infaâ, ne$ a t nerr d mmit nne$". Nitni ur faqen ara
Temmar ed tasa n yimma s n Musa. Qôib it id tessken, lemmer ur Nzeyyeô ara ul is, iwakken a ppili si lmumnin
Tenna i ultma s: "evfeô it"! Teqquôa t si mbâid, nitni ur faqen
Uqbel, Negdel as tid iûûuîuven. Tenna: "ad awen ssekne$ axxam ar awen itkwelfen fellas, u nitni ad as bedden
Nerra t id i imma s, iwakken ad as kkawent wallen is, ur t$webben, iwakken a péeô ar lemâahda n Öebbi d tidep. Maca, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
Mi meqqweô, ittaâqel, Nefka yas tussna, ûûwab. Akka ay Nepkafi imdanen lâali

Ikcem tamdint, di lweqt ideg stehzan imezda$ is. Iufa n sin irgazen pna$en, yiwen seg uêôum is, wayev seg icenga s. Win n uêôum is, issuter as d afus, mgal win n icenga s. Iwwet it Musa s lbunia, in$a t. Inna: "ayagi, seg igi n Cciîan. Neppa, s tidep, d acengu n ûûeê, itellifen
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek dense$ iman iw, Semmeê iyi". Isemmeê as. Ih, Neppa Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Inna: "a Mass iw! S l$it iK felli, ur ppili$, d awez$i, si loiha ibe$wviyen
Iufa d iman is di temdint, iugad, iquôaâ. Atan a d ipâaggiv $uôes, win i s d issutren afus, ass izeryen. Inna yas Musa: "keçç, s tidep, d im$eôôeq n ûûeê
Acengu nnsen, mi ib$a a t iwwet, inna d: "a Musa! Day teb$iv ad iyi ten$ev, akken ten$iv yiwen, ivelli? Teb$iv kan a ppiliv d aqehhaô di tmurt, ur teb$iv ara a ppiliv seg iâaôviyen
Iusa d urgaz si îîerf n temdint, ippazal. Inna d: "a Musa! S tidep, imvebbôen mlalen $ef loal ik, a k n$en. Effe$, nek, seg wid ik ipweûûin
Iffe$ segs, iugad, iquôaâ. Inna: "a Mass iw! Sellek iyi seg ugdud imednas
Mi ibbwi tikli ar Madian, inna: "ahat Mass iw ad iyi Iawi d ubrid umâin

Mi ibbwev s aman n Madian, iufa n arbaâ n l$aci, la sswan. Iufa, di îîerf nnsen, snat n tlawin, îîfent lmal nnsent. Inna: "d acu txeddmemt"? Nnant ed: "ur nesswa alamma wexxôen imeksawen. Babat ne$ d am$aô ameqwôan
Issew asent, iu$al ar tili, inna: "a Mass iw! Nek ôe$be$ $ef yal lxiô, ar iyi d Tessersev
Tusa t id yiwet segsent, s tikli ikukran, tenna: "atan ak d issawal baba, a k ikafi imi $ tesswev". Mi iôuê $uôes, u iêka yas i ivôan, inna: "ur ppagwad, tepwasellkev seg ugdud imednas
Yiwet segsent, tenna: "a baba! Eîîef it d acrik, ih, yif icriken ik, iohed, muman
Inna: "b$i$, nek, ad ak fke$ yiwet si yissi yagi, s cceôt a pxedmev $uôi îam iseggwasen. Ma tessawdev mraw, s leb$i k. Ur b$i$ a k hejjne$. Ad ak ili$, ma Irad Öebbi, seg iâaôviyen
Irra: "ayagi, gari yidek. A tin sâadda$ ger snat n tallitin, ur ippili felli u$ilif. Öebbi d Awkil, $ef wayen id nenna
Mi ifukk Musa tallit, u iseyyeê akked twacult is, iwala times ar tama n udrar. Inna i twacult is: "qqimet, wala$ times, ahat ad awen d awi$, segs, asali ne$ asafu, amar a ppesseêmum
Mi ibbwev $uôes, ipwanced ed si ttejôa, di rif ayeffus n te$zut, deg umviq iôqan: "a Musa! S tidep, Nek d Öebbi, Mass imavalen
Veggeô taâkwazt ik". Mi p iwala, la tesseêôiîiw amzun d azrem, ibren ur iwexxeô. "A Musa! Qeddem, ur ppagwad, aql ak, ih, di laman
Err afus ik di loib ik, a d iffe$ d amellal, ur ihlik. Sseqôeb ed $uôek i$il ik, ad ak tekkes tugwdi. Tigi d sin n ppbut s$uô Mass ik, i Ferâun akked imvebbôen is. Ih, nitni d agdud iballa$en
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek n$i$ yiwen segsen, ugade$ ad iyi n$en
Gma Harun yif iyi afeûûeê umeslay. Azen it id yidi d amâiwen, ad iyi tebbet. Nek ugade$ ad iyi nekôen
Inna: "a Nesseohed tayepp ik s gma k. Ad awen Nefk, i sin, adabu; ur kwen id ppawven. S issekniyen nne£, d kunwi akked wid iddan yidwen ara irebêen
Mi ibbwev $uôsen Musa, s issekniyen iberrzen, nnan: "ayagi, siwa ssêur id innulfan. Ur nesli s waya, $uô ibabaten nne$ imezwura
Inna Musa: "Mass iw Iéôa sennig wiyav, anwa iwumi Ifka nnhaya s$uôeS, anwa ara d igwrin deg Uxxam. Imednas, s tidep, ur rebêen

Inna Ferâun: "a yimvebbôen, ur awen mli$ ara kra n ôebbi, war nekkini. Ecâal iyi times ar talaxt, a Haman; bnu yi lbeôo aâlayen; ahat ad ali$ ar ÖÔebbi n Musa. Nek, s tidep, êesbe$ t seg wid iskiddiben
Neppa, akked iâsekôiwen is, sme$wôen iman nnsen di tmurt, war ssebba. £ilen, ar nitni, ur d ppu$alen $uône£
Neppa, akked iâsekôiwen is, Neîîef iten. Nger iten ar yill. Wali amek tevôa d imednas
Nerra ten d imeqwôanen i ineccden ar tmes. Ass n tnekra, ur ppusellken
Neqqen asen xezzu di ddunit agi. Ass n tnekra, nitni seg ucmiten
Ni$ Nefka Tazmamt i Musa, mbaâd ma Nesqucc isuta imezwura. D tafat i imdanen, d nnhaya u d aêunu. Amar a d mmektin
Ur telliv ara di loiha utaram, mi Nseyya lameô i Musa. Ur telliv seg inagan
Maca, Nxelq ed tisuta, $wezzif laâmeô nnsent. Ur tellid seg imezda$ n Madian, la sen teqqarev issekniyen nne£. Maca, Nella Neppazen
Ur telliv ar tama n udrar, mi d Nessawel. Maca d aêunu s$uô Mass ik, iwakken a pnedrev agdud, u$uô ur d iusi uneddaô, uqbel ik. Amar a d mmektin
Mulac, ma têuza ten tiyta id urwen ifassen nnsen, a d inin: "a Mass nne$! A lemmer i $ d Tuznev amazan, a neddu d issekniyen iK, a nili seg wid iumnen
Mi ten id tusa tidep s$uône£, nnan: "a lemmer id iusi am wayen id iusan i Musa"! Day ur ugin ara, zik, ayen id iusan i Musa? Nnan: "d sin ssêurat". Mwafaqen, nnan: "nekwni nugi ten i sin
Ini: "awit ed Tazmamt, s$uô Öebbi, i yifen snat agi, i nnhaya, ad ddu$ yides, ma tessawalem tidep
Ma ur ak d rran ara, efhem ar ddan kan d lhawiyyat nnsen. Anwa innetlafen, sennig win iteddun d lhawiyya s, war nnhaya s$uô Öebbi? Öebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Aql a£ Nessawwev asen awal, amendeô ma d mmektin
Umnen yis wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, uqbel tagi
Ma $ôan asen t, ad inin: "numen yis. Ih, ar neppa d tidep, s$uô Mass nne$. Uqbel is, s tidep, nella d imvuâen
Wigi a ten id ias ukafi nnsen berdayen, $ef wayen ûebôen, swexxiôen tucmip s yise$, u seg wayen iten N$at, pseddiqen
Mi slan i yir awal, ad as veôfen, u qaôen: "i nekwni igiten nne$, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Fellawen talwit. Ur neô$eb $ef at war tussna
Keçç, s tidep, ur tnehhuv win têemlev. Maca, Öebbi Inehhu win i S ihwan. Neppa, Yif akw akken Iéôa wid ipwanhan
Nnan: "ma nedda d nnhaya yidek, a nepwaxvef seg wakal nne$". Day ur ten Nesseqâad ara di loamaâ n laman, u$uô d ppawvent yal l$ellat? D l$it s$uône£. Maca, tegwti degsen, ur éôin
Acêal Nesqucc n temdininn, cerrâent di temâict nnsent. Atnan ixxamen nnsen, ay ten ized$en, deffir sen, siwa ixeîîayen. D Nekwni ay d iweôôaten
Ur Isquccu Mass ik timdinin, alamma iuzen i imezda$ nnsent, amazan i sen immalen issekniyen nne£. Ur Nesquccu timdinin, mebla ma llan imezda$ nnsent, d imednas
Kra n wayen i wen ippunefken n cci, d zzhu n tmeddurt n ddunit, akked ccbuê is. Ayen illan $eô Öebbi, yif it, ad idum kter. Day ur pmeyyizen ara
Day win iwumi Nefka lemâahda igerzen, u immuger ip, am win i Nezha s l$it n tmeddurt n ddunit; sinna, ass n tnekra, neppa seg wid ara d irsen
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad Yini: "anda ten wid iyY tepcarakem, u tellam tepkabarem
A d inin wid i$ef iûaô wawal: "a Mass nne$! Wigi i njeggeê, njeggeê iten, akken i nepwajeggeê. A nzekki $ureK: maççi d nekwni ay âabden
Ad asen inin: "naâôet wid tepcarakem". Ad ten naâôen, ur asen d pparan. Walan aâaqeb. A lemmer llan pwanhan
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad Yini: "acu d terram i imazanen
Assen, ad dergen fellasen isalen, nitni ur pmesteqsayen
Ma d win isteôoâen, iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan, ahat ad yili seg imerbaê
Mass ik Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan, u Ismenyafa. Ur ten id iûaê usmenyif. Gedha s Öebbi! I Aâlay sennig wayen pcaraken
Mass ik Iéôa ayen iffren deg idmaren nnsen, akked wayen cennâen
Neppa d Öebbi, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa. I Neppa, annuz di tmezwarut, u di tneggarut. I Neppa aêuddu, $uôeS tu$alin nnwen
Ini: "acu tmeyyzem, ma Isse$li d Öebbi iv imezgi, fellawen, alamma d ass n tnekra? Anwa ôebbi, war Öebbi, ara wen d iawin tafat? Day ur tsellem ara
Ini: "acu tmeyyzem, ma Issuli Öebbi ass imezgi, fellawen, alamma d ass n tnekra? Anwa ôebbi, war Öebbi, ara wen d iawin iv, a ppestaâfum degs? Day ur tepwalim ara
Seg uêunu S, Iga yawen iv akked wass, i ustaâfu nnwen, akked unadi n lfevl iS. Amar a ppesnemmrem
Ass ideg ara sen d Isiwel, ad asen Yini: "anda ten wid iyY tepcarakem, u tellam tepkabarem
A d Nawi anagi, si yal lois. A Nini: "awit ed atebbet nnwen". Ad éôen ar tidep n Öebbi. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen
Ih, Qaôun illa seg ugdud n Musa. Iqehô iten. Nefka yas igerrujen; s tezmert ugraw ioehden, arfad n tsura nnsen. Mi s inna ugdud is: "ur zehhu! Öebbi, s tidep, ur Iêemmel ara izehwaniyen
Deg wayen i k Ifka Öebbi, nadi axxam aneggaru. Ur teppu amur ik, di ddunit. Elhu, akken i Ilha Öebbi $uôek. Ur ssaram lefsad di tmurt. Öebbi, s tidep, ur Iêemmel ifessaden
Inna: "ippunefk iyi kan, ilmend n tmusni i sâi$". Day ur iéôa ara ar Öebbi Isqucc, uqbel is, ger isuta, wid i t iugaren di tezmert, isemmden kteô? Ur illi usteqsi ibe$wviyen, af ibekkaven nnsen
Iffe$ ed s agdud is, s ôôêuê is. Wid ib$an tameddurt n ddunit, nnan: "awufan nesâa am wayen ippunefken i Qaôun! Ih, neppa d bab n terkunt tabarart
Wid, iwumi teppunefk tmusni, nnan: "a ssexv nnwen! Ppwab n Öebbi yif it, i win iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ara d iûaê siwa win iûebôen
Nger it seddaw tmurt, neppa akked uxxam is. Ur as telli terbaât ara t isellken, war Öebbi. Ur illi seg wid ipselliken iman nnsen
Wid issaramen amkan is, ivelli nni, u$alen nnan: "zi$ Öebbi Issugut ôôeéq i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS, u iwezzen. Lemmer ur a$ I$at ara Öebbi, yili Iger a$ seddaw tmurt. Ih, ur rebêen ijehliyen
Axxam nni aneggaru, a t Nerr i wid ijunben tem$weô akked usefsed, di tmurt. Tirect i wid ipêezziben
Win id iusan s yise$, ad iawi ayen it yifen. Win id iusan s tucmip, ihi, ad ppuqeîîin wid ixedmen tucmitin, $ef wayen kan xeddmen
Ih, Win Ilezmen fellak Leqwôan, war ccekk, a k id Irr s axxam. Ini: "Mass iw Yif akw akken Issen anwa id iusan s nnhaya, anwa i illan di ttelfan n ûûeê
Ur tessarmev ara, ad ak ed ters Tezmamt, lemmer maççi d aêunu s$uô Mass ik. Ur ppili d amâiwen ijehliyen
Ur k swexxiôen seg issekniyen n Öebbi, deffir trusi nnsen $uôek. Nuj ar Mass ik, ur ppili seg wid ipcaraken
Ur nâaô, ar tama n Öebbi, ôebbi nniven. Ur illi ôebbi, siwa Neppa. Yal cci ad inger, siwa udem iS. IneS aêuddu. £ureS ara tu$alem

Day $ilen imdanen a ten ooen qqaôen: "numen", u nitni ur ppuhewwlen
Ni$ Nhewwel wid i ten id izwaren. War ccekk, ad Yissin Öebbi wid iqqaôen tidep, ad Yissin ikeddaben
Ne$ $ilen ad a£ zwiren wid ixedmen tucmitin? Dir it wayen pêuddun
Win iggunin timlilit akked Öebbi, s tidep, a d ias, war ccekk, lajel n Öebbi. Neppa, Issel, d Amusnaw
Win ijuhden, ijuhed kan i iman is. Öebbi, s tidep, ur Iêwao ara imavalen
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, ad asen Nekkes tucmitin nnsen, a ten Nkafi $ef wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Nweûûa amdan ar lewqama, s imawlan is. Ma lezmen fellak, ad iyI tcarkev ayen ur tessinev, ur asen ppa$ awal. Tu$alin nnwen, $uôI. Ad awen Mle$ acu txeddmem
Wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan, war ccekk, a ten Nessekcem ar iâaôviyen

Ger imdanen, wid iqqaôen: "numen s Öebbi". Ma meênen, deg ubrid n Öebbi, ad êesben ahewwel n medden, d aâaqeb n Öebbi. Mi d iusa l$elb, s$uô Mass ik, ar ad inin: "ih, nella yidwen". Day ur Iéôa ara Öebbi, i illan deg idmaren imavalen
War ccekk, Öebbi Issen wid iumnen, Issen ixabiten
Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "ddut d ubrid nne$, a nbibb tuccva nnwen". Nitni ur pbibbin acemma, si tuccva nnsen. S tidep, nitni d ikeddaben
War ccekk, ad bibben tiâekkwmin nnsen, akked tiâekkwmin nniven. Ih, ad ppusteqsin, ass n tnekra, af wayen id snulfuyen
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nuê, i ugdud is. Izde$ yides, agim kkes ed smuset iseggwasen. Ibbwi ten uêemmal, nitni d imednas
Nsellek it, neppa akked wid iddan di lbabuô. Nerra t d assekni i imavalen
Ibôahim, mi inna i ugdud is: "âabdet Öebbi, êezzbet aS. Yif it wakka, i kunwi, lemmer teéôim
Tâabdem kan tiâancuôin, war Öebbi. Tesnulfam d tikerkas. Ih, wid tâabdem, war Öebbi, ur zmiren a kwen $iten. Ssutret l$it i Öebbi, âabdet eP, snemmret aS. £uôeS ara tu$alem
Ma tnekôem, ihi, uqbel nnwen, nekôen leoyus". I iwatan, i umazan, siwa assiwev ubeggen
Day ur walan ara, amek id Inezzu Öebbi lxelq, sinna, Ippales as. Ih, ayagi, i Öebbi, d ushil
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, walit amek id Inza lxelq. Sinna, Öebbi a d Iawi lxelq aneggaru. Ih, Öebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ikkat win i S ihwan; Ipêunu $ef win i S ihwan. £ureS jebbu nnwen
Ur tesfunnugem, kunwi, di tmurt, ne$ deg igenni. Ur tesâim, war Öebbi, bab ne$ asettaô
Wid iugin issekniyen n Öebbi, akked temlilit yideS, widak ad aysen aêunu W. I widak, aâaqeb aqeôêan
Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi d nnan: "en$et ep, ne$ sseô$et ep". Isellek it Öebbi, si tmes. Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i ugdud iumnen
Inna: "teddmem kan tiâancuôin, war Öebbi. Temêemmalem di tmeddurt n ddunit, sinna, ass n tnekra, kra degwen ad nekôen wiyav, kra ad xzun wiyav. Axxam nnwen d times, ur awen illi usellak
Iumen it Luî. Inna: "nek, d iminig ar Mass iw. Ih, Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
N$at it s Isêaq akked Yaâqub. I tarwas, Nefka lambiyya, Tazmamt. Nefka yas taqviât is, di ddunit; u neppa, di laxeôt, war ccekk, seg iâaôviyen
Luî, mi inna i ugdud is: "ih, aql akwen la txedmem lâaô, ur ixdim yiwen, zik, deg imavalen
La teppeddum, ih, ar irgazen, tgezzmem abrid, txeddmem ayen icemten, deg igrawen nnwen". Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi nnan: "awi a$ d aâaqeb n Öebbi, ma telliv seg wid issawalen tidep

Mi usan imceggâen nne£, ar Luî, i$wbel ilmend nnsen, ur izmir a ten ifukk. Nnan as: "ur ppagwad, ur $webbel. Nekwni a k Naâteq, keçç d twacult ik, siwa tameîîut ik, ara yilin seg wid igwran

Ini: "Iqadd Öebbi, d anagi gari yidwen. Issen i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Wid iumnen di tkerkas, u ugin Öebbi, widak d imexsuôen

Ass ideg ar asen isbur uâaqeb, sennig sen, akw seddaw ivaôen nnsen, ad Yini: "jeôôbet ayen txeddmem
A yimdanen iW iumnen, ni$ tamurt iW tewsaâ. Ihi, âabdet iyI, Nek

Ma testeqûav ten: "anwa id Isse$layen aman seg igenni, Issidir yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is"? A d inin, war ccekk, "d Öebbi". Ini: "ccekôan i Öebbi". Maca, tegwti degsen, ur fhimen

Wid ijuhden ar loiha nne£, a ten Nenhu, war ccekk, s iberdan nne£. Ih, Öebbi Ippili ar lâuûam

Ppensaren d ibeôdiyen nnsen, seg imîeôêen, pnujun $eô Mass nnsen, s tugwdi d usirem. Seg wayen iten N$at, pseddiqen
Ur iéôi yiwen acu i sen Ffre$ n lfeôê. D arraz n wayen llan xeddmen

Iéôa ayen ikeççmen di tmurt, ayen id iteff$en segs, ayen id iprusun seg igenni, ayen ippalin $uôes. Neppa Ipêunu, Ipsemmiê

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur a$ d ippas yimir". Ini: "xaîi, s Mass iw, ara kwen id ias"! Amusnaw n tbavnit, ur idrig fellaS ubruy ubelkim, ama deg igenwan, ama di ddunit; ama seddaw wannect is, ama sennig es; akw, di Tezmamt ipbegginen

Ur k id Nuzen, i imdanen, armi d uqniâ; a pbecôôev, a pnedôev. Maca, tegwti n yimdanen, ur ssinen

Ini: "$uôwen ppaâud ass, ur tezmirem a t teswexxôem, ne$ a t id tesqeôbem, s saâa

Ad inin imzuxiyen i uôhifen: "day d nekwni ikwen isfeô$en af nnhaya, mi kwen id iusa? Xaîi, tellam d ibe$wviyen
